DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the effects of ingesting or mouth rinsing a sucrose (carbohydrate) versus a sucralose (carbohydrate-free) drink on self control, cognitive performance, and blood glucose level.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Ingesting or Rinsing Sucrose and Sucralose on Self-control, Cognitive Performance, and Blood Glucose
DOC.criteria: BMI 18 29 kg/m2 Dementia Depression Type 2 diabetes Phenylketonuria Intake of medication known to affect glucose metabolism Fasting blood glucose > 7.8 mmol/L
